description: The cycle information for the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each cycle in the treatment plan in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_ID
columns.description: The treatment plan level ID for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_NAME
columns.description: The cycle name of the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cycle status of the cycle in this row.  For example, Planned, Started, Completed, Deleted, or Snapshot.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Started


Completed


Deleted


Snapshot

columns.name: CYCLE_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the cycle in this row, in calendar format.

columns.name: CYCLE_WAIT_AFTER
columns.description: The number of days to wait after the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_MAX_LEAD
columns.description: The max lead for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_MAX_LAG
columns.description: The max lag for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: ANCHOR_DAY
columns.description: The treatment plan level ID of the anchor day for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_CREATED_BY_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who created the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_CREATED_ON_TM
columns.description: The date and time of creation in external format for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_COMMENT
columns.description: The cycle creation comment for the cycle in this row.

columns.name: CYCLE_NUM
columns.description: The cycle number of this cycle for this treatment plan.

columns.name: CYC_STAT_CHG_USR_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who changed the cycle status.

columns.name: CYC_STAT_CHG_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the cycle status changed.

columns.name: CYC_STAT_CHG_COMM
columns.description: Stores comment entered by user when changing the status.

columns.name: CYC_SOURCE_UID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the cycle from which it was created.

columns.name: PRL_CYCLE_SRC_ID
columns.description: If this treatment plan cycle was created from a protocol, this item will be set to the Cycle ID (I PRL 200) that created this treatment plan cycle. This column will match the CL_PRL_CYCLES__PRL_CYCLE_ID column.

columns.name: CONVERSION_CYC_TRGT
columns.description: If this cycle was replaced by another cycle when conversion is accepted or discarded, this will be the line of the cycle that replaced it (SI TPL 1000).
